pullrequest.title: Performance: Delete / insert models as we need them in view

content.raw:
I downloaded the delete_insert branch just now and ran unique_task3.launch
With just task3 (not using the whole world with delete and insert) the performance was too slow (0.13) to walk stably.  It takes a few steps and falls. With the other tasks, this machine is above 0.3
